title: low priority queue
body:
got a 10minute low priority queue for afk/leaving games too many times
is "0" too many times?
fix this rito

replies.body:
as in the new post I just made the ping goes to 500 says attempting to reconnect then does nothing unless I restart league
restarting league = leave game and leaverbuster even though rejoining straight away
and now its  20min timer on a game I was out of for 2mins and we won it anyway
needs to be fixed
It all depends. Were you disconnected in a game unintentionally?
